title: Server Issues - 11pm 29/2
body:
Yeah, so both sides are currently suffering massive packetloss and lag.

This isn't an individual issue, it's a server problem!


Edit:  This match needs to have Loss Prevention applied to it...

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/123699517/104695

Our team couldn't move for minutes at a time, whilst the opposition could manage to get Baron and Dragon without issue!
